name: The Village of Shin
description: Originally founded by the monks of the Whistling Fist order, the island is also home to several peaceful trading families in the Village of Shin. The Far Seas Trading Company now maintains a small trading base on this island where skilled crafters are sure to find work.

npcs.name: Captain Ingrid
utterances: Welcome! I'm pleased that you have made the journey here.
I'm sorry, but I am looking for someone more seasoned to help me carry out my duties.

npcs.name: Ensign Geredo
utterances: Sorry friend, but I'm looking for someone more worldly to help resolve my romantic quandary.
